result.execSummary:
The defendant Jeffrey W Dean was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Jeffrey W Dean is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Jeffrey W Dean was found guilty of Possession of Methamphetamine, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Jeffrey W Dean in court with attorney Scott S. Schlough.  Defendant Jeffrey W Dean in custody.  Russell Edward Berg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
COVERS 14CF308 AND 15CF135.
Judge Boyle relates that she has prosecuted defendant in past and offers Defendant right to have another Judge hear pleas.  Defendant waives any conflict and wishes to proceed today.
Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights presented for each case.    
State relates Joint recommendation.  Attorney Schlough relates.

Court questions defendant.  Felony admonitions given including firearm prohibition and voter's rights.

14CF308: Defendant enters Guilty Plea on Count 1.  Court accepts and finds Guilty on Count 1.  
Court orders Count 2 - dismissed.   
15CF135: Defendant enters Guilty Plea on Count 1.  Court accepts and finds Guilty on Count 1.  

Defendant waives PSI.  Court waives PSI.    
Victim's rights have been complied with.
State relates.  Attorney Schlough relates. 
Defendant addresses Court.

Court relates and orders:
14CF308 Count 1:
Jail: 9 months with huber - consecutive to Case 13CF114.
Court Costs.
DNA and surcharge.

15CF135 Count 1:
Jail: 9 months with huber - consecutive to Case 14CF308 and 13CF114.
Court Costs.
DNA and surcharge.

60 Days to pay Court costs or may set up payment plan.  
Voter's ineligibility form given.

No agreement.  Proceed with JT.
